common_issues.title: PiecesOS launch failure
common_issues.description: Users are reporting inability to launch PiecesOS Windows Desktop Version 11.1.1 due to stricter hardware requirements. The issue is being tracked by Pieces and a patch is expected within 24-48 hours. Users are encouraged to provide logs from 'c://Users/{USERNAME}/Documents/com.pieces.os/production/Support' for assistance.

related_issues.title: PiecesOS was unable to launch.
related_issues.text:
PiecesOS was unable to launch.
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

latest

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7a6a7957-5aa1-4d53-b492-cf4470aa5edc)
## GitHub Issue Summary

**Title:** Unable to Launch Pieces Windows Desktop Version

**Key Points:**

* Users are experiencing issues launching Pieces Windows Desktop Version 11.1.1.
* The issue appears to be related to stricter hardware requirements than initially anticipated.

**Problems Identified:**

* Some users' hardware does not meet the new requirements.
* The app is not launching for affected users.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Pieces support recommended providing logs from `c://Users/{USERNAME}/Documents/com.pieces.os/production/Support`.
* A patch is planned for release within 24-48 hours to address the issue.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is currently being tracked by the Pieces team.
* A fix is expected to be released soon.

**Additional Notes:**

* Several related issues have been reported on GitHub.
* Users are encouraged to refer to the provided resources for further assistance.

recommendations: **Proactively address the PiecesOS launch failure:** With a patch expected soon, prepare support documentation and communication for users on how to access and apply the patch.  Consider a temporary FAQ or knowledge base article.

**Investigate hardware requirement mismatch:** Analyze the logs from affected users to understand the specific hardware limitations causing the launch failures. This will help in tailoring the patch and future hardware requirement communication.

**Improve error messaging:**  The current PiecesOS launch error should be made more user-friendly. Provide specific details about the issue (e.g., which hardware requirement is not met) and guidance on where to find more information or support.
